title: Personal portfolio website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my skills, project and information. It serves as a professional online presence to highlight my work and achievements.

title: ToDo List
description: A task management application allowing users to create, update, and delete tasks. It helps users stay organized by providing a simple and efficient way to manage their to-do lists.

title: Focus Timer
description: A productivity tool based on the Pomodoro Technique, featuring a timer for focused work intervals. It aids in time management and increased productivity during work sessions.
